Text: Oh yeah, this is a Doris Wishman (sometimes referred to as the female Ed Wood) classic - RUBrTOE
This is more like topless on the moon. There's no complete nudity. The title is misleading. :)

quit whining fer chripes sakes, at least the tits are big and natural. It's the 1950s for cryin' out loud and there's wall-to-wall tits in it. Shit like this was a crime back then and it's a hell-uv-a lot better than the crap they spew out today with about 1 1/12 tits and no vagina.

Thanks very much for putting this up!  This is a classic of this variety of American drive-in-movie genre at the time.  I've visited Coral Castle in Homestead, Florida (formerly known as Rock Gate Park), and am thrilled to get to be able to see so much footage of the place - for those of you "In the know", Coral Castle was built by one man named Edward Leedskalnin, who weighed in at about 90 pounds (42 kg) or so, and constructed the entire "castle" with only basic tools between 1919 and 1939.  The entire place weighs in at over 1100 tons of hand-quarried oolite, which is extremely difficult to cut.  But I digress...

I love old-school cheezy sci-fi movies, and I also love the look of natural buxom women.  Watch porn all you like, but there's just something about "real" women that I dig.  True, this movie isn't "porn" by any of our current definitions, but personally, I feel this movie is well worth watching.

This is a *very* excellent copy of a film that is very difficult to find.  Thanks very much for letting me check out a cool piece of classic film history.

heh, I love it... interesting when they all have real 100% natural breasts...
